column1: Improve application performance during screen transitions.
Redesign the menu structure to enhance discoverability.
Fix intermittent crash occurring on content detail view.
Refactor authentication flow for session stability.
Implement dark mode UI fixes across all devices.
Enable persistent login and device handoff support.
Add support for contextual notifications with user controls.
Introduce a simplified layout for better mobile usability.
Optimize search algorithm to improve relevance of results.
Resolve layout rendering issues on smaller form factors.
